CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 12, 1946, pg. 1, reads: "Swearing in New Magistrate - Police magistrate Robert E. (Pappy) Williams takes the oath as Mayor David Lawrence swears him in as the city's first Negro magistrate, in Council Chambers, Tuesday. - Harris Photo"David L. Lawrence was Mayor of the City of Pittsburgh 1946-1959, Governor of Pennsylvania 1959-1963, and he died in 1966.
TitMainTitle: Pittsburgh Mayor David L. Lawrence swearing in Robert E. "Pappy" Williams as magistrate, with group of men and women gathered around them, in Pittsburgh City Council Chambers, City County Building
CatSubject_tab: Lawrence, David Leo, 1889-1966.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Mayors--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.City-County Building (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Williams, Robert E.
